pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion.
pre_caption: The video begins with an aerial view of a church, showing its detailed structure and the surrounding graveyard. The church has a long, pointed spire and a series of windows along its facade. The graveyard is adjacent to the church, with numerous gravestones scattered across the area. A dirt path runs from the church towards the graveyard, winding through the landscape. The surrounding area includes trees and some greenery, providing a natural border around the church and graveyard. The camera remains steady, maintaining a consistent view of the church and its surroundings throughout the video.
